synopsis.text: Bâ€™Ts, the next generation of robots, are powerful, sentient beings that operate on the blood of their human donors, to whom they pledge absolute loyalty. When renowned scientist Kotaro Takamiya is kidnapped by the ruthless Machine Empire to perfect these robotic creatures, his younger brother Teppei embarks on a daring rescue mission. During his pursuit, Teppei encounters a broken mechanical horse, B'T X, which revives upon contact with his blood. Now, with the legendary B'T-X by his side, Teppei must navigate through the treacherous Gobi Desert, confront the oppressive Machine Empire, and save his brother from their sinister plans for world domination. Will Teppei's bond with B'T-X prove strong enough to overcome the challenges that lie ahead? Join Teppei and B'T-X in this thrilling adventure that explores the power of loyalty, bravery, and the unbreakable bond between man and machine.
